delete from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> T where exists ( select 1 from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> E where ODI_SESS_NO = '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>' and T.rowid = E.ODI_ROW_ID )

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', '', sysdate, '(12)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.OTHER EXAMPLES #2 - IKM Oracle Partition Exchange Load - Reusable Mapping', 'W_ORDERS_F_CHK7', 'CK', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> W_ORDERS_F where not ( REVENUE_AMT > 0 )
Create local indexes on flow table

--SET SERVEROUTPUT ON; DECLARE c_count NUMBER := 0; BEGIN FOR TableLocalCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, sp.subpartition_position, sp.subpartition_name, sp.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) JOIN all_ind_subpartitions sp ON (ip.partition_name = sp.partition_name AND ip.index_name = sp.index_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' <$ String PartitionExchangeType; PartitionExchangeType = "PARTITION"; if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("PARTITION")) { $> AND tp.partition_name ='<$="JUL2014"$>' <$ } if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("SUBPARTITION")) { $> AND sp.subpartition_name ='<$="JUL2014"$>' <$ } $> AND ip.composite = 'YES' ORDER BY sp.subpartition_position ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); c_count := c_count + 1; END LOOP; IF c_count = 0 THEN FOR TableLocalNonCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, ip.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' AND tp.partition_name ='<$="JUL2014"$>' AND ip.composite = 'NO' ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="JUL2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); --SET SERVEROUTPUT ON; DECLARE c_count NUMBER := 0; BEGIN FOR TableLocalCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, sp.subpartition_position, sp.subpartition_name, sp.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) JOIN all_ind_subpartitions sp ON (ip.partition_name = sp.partition_name AND ip.index_name = sp.index_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' <$ String PartitionExchangeType; PartitionExchangeType = "PARTITION"; if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("PARTITION")) { $> AND tp.partition_name ='<$="DEC2014"$>' <$ } if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("SUBPARTITION")) { $> AND sp.subpartition_name ='<$="DEC2014"$>' <$ } $> AND ip.composite = 'YES' ORDER BY sp.subpartition_position ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); END LOOP; IF c_count = 0 THEN FOR TableLocalNonCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, ip.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' AND tp.partition_name ='<$="DEC2014"$>' AND ip.composite = 'NO' ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="DEC2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="DEC2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); END LOOP; END IF; END;

DECLARE c_fk_name varchar2(30) := ''; BEGIN c_fk_name := '<?= odiRef.getObjectShortName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?>'; IF length(c_fk_name) > 24 THEN c_fk_name := SUBSTR(c_fk_name,1,24); END IF; c_fk_name := c_fk_name||'_FK'; FOR TableConstraint IN ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUMBER, c2.column_name, C4.OWNER FK_OWNER, c4.table_name FK_TABLE, c4.column_name FK_COLUMN FROM all_CONSTRAINTS C1 INNER JOIN all_cons_columns C2 ON (c1.constraint_name=c2.constraint_name AND c1.table_name =c2.table_name AND c1.owner = c2.owner) INNER JOIN all_CONSTRAINTS C3 ON (c3.constraint_name = c1.r_constraint_name AND C1.OWNER = C3.OWNER) INNER JOIN all_CONS_COLUMNS C4 ON (c3.constraint_name =c4.constraint_name AND c3.table_name =c4.table_name AND c3.owner = c4.owner) WHERE C1.TABLE_NAME ='W_ORDERS_F' AND c1.owner = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND C1.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C1.STATUS = 'ENABLED' ORDER BY c1.constraint_name, c2.position ) LOOP EXECUTE immediate 'alter table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> add constraint '||c_fk_name||TO_CHAR(TableConstraint.ROW_NUMBER)||' foreign key ("'||TableConstraint.COLUMN_NAME||'") references "'||TableConstraint.FK_OWNER||'"."'||TableConstraint.FK_TABLE||'" ("'||TableConstraint.FK_COLUMN||'")'; END LOOP; END;

DECLARE c_fk_name varchar2(30) := ''; BEGIN c_fk_name := '<?= odiRef.getObjectShortName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?>'; IF length(c_fk_name) > 24 THEN c_fk_name := SUBSTR(c_fk_name,1,24); END IF; c_fk_name := c_fk_name||'_FK'; FOR TableConstraint IN ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUMBER, c2.column_name, C4.OWNER FK_OWNER, c4.table_name FK_TABLE, c4.column_name FK_COLUMN FROM all_CONSTRAINTS C1 INNER JOIN all_cons_columns C2 ON (c1.constraint_name=c2.constraint_name AND c1.table_name =c2.table_name AND c1.owner = c2.owner) INNER JOIN all_CONSTRAINTS C3 ON (c3.constraint_name = c1.r_constraint_name AND C1.OWNER = C3.OWNER) INNER JOIN all_CONS_COLUMNS C4 ON (c3.constraint_name =c4.constraint_name AND c3.table_name =c4.table_name AND c3.owner = c4.owner) WHERE C1.TABLE_NAME ='W_ORDERS_F' AND c1.owner = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND C1.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C1.STATUS = 'ENABLED' ORDER BY c1.constraint_name, c2.position ) LOOP EXECUTE immediate 'alter table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> add constraint '||c_fk_name||TO_CHAR(TableConstraint.ROW_NUMBER)||' foreign key ("'||TableConstraint.COLUMN_NAME||'") references "'||TableConstraint.FK_OWNER||'"."'||TableConstraint.FK_TABLE||'" ("'||TableConstraint.FK_COLUMN||'")'; END LOOP; END;

END LOOP; IF c_count = 0 THEN FOR TableLocalNonCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, ip.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' AND tp.partition_name ='<$="FEB2014"$>' AND ip.composite = 'NO' ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="FEB2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="FEB2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); END LOOP; END IF; END;

DECLARE c_fk_name varchar2(30) := ''; BEGIN c_fk_name := '<?= odiRef.getObjectShortName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?>'; IF length(c_fk_name) > 24 THEN c_fk_name := SUBSTR(c_fk_name,1,24); END IF; c_fk_name := c_fk_name||'_FK'; FOR TableConstraint IN ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUMBER, c2.column_name, C4.OWNER FK_OWNER, c4.table_name FK_TABLE, c4.column_name FK_COLUMN FROM all_CONSTRAINTS C1 INNER JOIN all_cons_columns C2 ON (c1.constraint_name=c2.constraint_name AND c1.table_name =c2.table_name AND c1.owner = c2.owner) INNER JOIN all_CONSTRAINTS C3 ON (c3.constraint_name = c1.r_constraint_name AND C1.OWNER = C3.OWNER) INNER JOIN all_CONS_COLUMNS C4 ON (c3.constraint_name =c4.constraint_name AND c3.table_name =c4.table_name AND c3.owner = c4.owner) WHERE C1.TABLE_NAME ='W_ORDERS_F' AND c1.owner = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND C1.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C1.STATUS = 'ENABLED' ORDER BY c1.constraint_name, c2.position ) LOOP EXECUTE immediate 'alter table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> add constraint '||c_fk_name||TO_CHAR(TableConstraint.ROW_NUMBER)||' foreign key ("'||TableConstraint.COLUMN_NAME||'") references "'||TableConstraint.FK_OWNER||'"."'||TableConstraint.FK_TABLE||'" ("'||TableConstraint.FK_COLUMN||'")'; END LOOP; END;

insert /*+ APPEND */ into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> select <$="#A_TEAM.FLOW_TABLE_OPTIMIZER_HINT"$> ORDERS_APR2014_1.ORDER_NUM, ORDERS_APR2014_1.ORDER_DT, W_STATUS_D_APR2014_1.ROW_WID, W_CUSTOMER_D_APR2014.ROW_WID, W_PRODUCT_D_APR2014_1.ROW_WID, ORDERS_APR2014_1.QUANTITY * ORDERS_APR2014_1.PRICE, ORDERS_APR2014_1.CREATED_DT, ORDERS_APR2014_1.UPDATED_DT from ((<?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ORDERS", "Staging", "D") ?> ORDERS_APR2014_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT W_CUSTOMER_D_APR2014_1.ROW_WID ROW_WID , W_CUSTOMER_D_APR2014_1.CUST_ID CUST_ID , W_CUSTOMER_D_APR2014_1.CURRENT_FLAG CURRENT_FLAG FROM <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_CUSTOMER_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_CUSTOMER_D_APR2014_1 WHERE (W_CUSTOMER_D_APR2014_1.CURRENT_FLAG = #A_TEAM.DefaultType2CurrentFlag ) ) W_CUSTOMER_D_APR2014 ON ORDERS_APR2014_1.CUST_ID = W_CUSTOMER_D_APR2014.CUST_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_STATUS_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_STATUS_D_APR2014_1 ON ORDERS_APR2014_1.ORDER_STATUS = W_STATUS_D_APR2014_1.STATUS_CD ) LEFT OUTER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_PRODUCT_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_PRODUCT_D_APR2014_1 ON ORDERS_APR2014_1.PROD_ID = W_PRODUCT_D_APR2014_1.PROD_ID where (1=1) and (ORDERS_APR2014_1.ORDER_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('APR2014','#A_TEAM.PartitionDateFormat') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('APR2014','#A_TEAM.PartitionDateFormat')))

DECLARE c_fk_name varchar2(30) := ''; BEGIN c_fk_name := '<?= odiRef.getObjectShortName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?>'; IF length(c_fk_name) > 24 THEN c_fk_name := SUBSTR(c_fk_name,1,24); END IF; c_fk_name := c_fk_name||'_FK'; FOR TableConstraint IN ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUMBER, c2.column_name, C4.OWNER FK_OWNER, c4.table_name FK_TABLE, c4.column_name FK_COLUMN FROM all_CONSTRAINTS C1 INNER JOIN all_cons_columns C2 ON (c1.constraint_name=c2.constraint_name AND c1.table_name =c2.table_name AND c1.owner = c2.owner) INNER JOIN all_CONSTRAINTS C3 ON (c3.constraint_name = c1.r_constraint_name AND C1.OWNER = C3.OWNER) INNER JOIN all_CONS_COLUMNS C4 ON (c3.constraint_name =c4.constraint_name AND c3.table_name =c4.table_name AND c3.owner = c4.owner) WHERE C1.TABLE_NAME ='W_ORDERS_F' AND c1.owner = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND C1.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C1.STATUS = 'ENABLED' ORDER BY c1.constraint_name, c2.position ) LOOP EXECUTE immediate 'alter table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> add constraint '||c_fk_name||TO_CHAR(TableConstraint.ROW_NUMBER)||' foreign key ("'||TableConstraint.COLUMN_NAME||'") references "'||TableConstraint.FK_OWNER||'"."'||TableConstraint.FK_TABLE||'" ("'||TableConstraint.FK_COLUMN||'")'; END LOOP; END;

--SET SERVEROUTPUT ON; DECLARE c_count NUMBER := 0; BEGIN FOR TableLocalCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, sp.subpartition_position, sp.subpartition_name, sp.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) JOIN all_ind_subpartitions sp ON (ip.partition_name = sp.partition_name AND ip.index_name = sp.index_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' <$ String PartitionExchangeType; PartitionExchangeType = "PARTITION"; if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("PARTITION")) { $> AND tp.partition_name ='<$="SEP2014"$>' <$ } if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("SUBPARTITION")) { $> AND sp.subpartition_name ='<$="SEP2014"$>' <$ } $> AND ip.composite = 'YES' ORDER BY sp.subpartition_position ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); c_count := c_count + 1; END LOOP; IF c_count = 0 THEN FOR TableLocalNonCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, ip.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' AND tp.partition_name ='<$="SEP2014"$>' AND ip.composite = 'NO' ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="SEP2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="SEP2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); END LOOP; END IF; END;

DECLARE c_fk_name varchar2(30) := ''; BEGIN c_fk_name := '<?= odiRef.getObjectShortName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?>'; IF length(c_fk_name) > 24 THEN c_fk_name := SUBSTR(c_fk_name,1,24); END IF; c_fk_name := c_fk_name||'_FK'; FOR TableConstraint IN ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUMBER, c2.column_name, C4.OWNER FK_OWNER, c4.table_name FK_TABLE, c4.column_name FK_COLUMN FROM all_CONSTRAINTS C1 INNER JOIN all_cons_columns C2 ON (c1.constraint_name=c2.constraint_name AND c1.table_name =c2.table_name AND c1.owner = c2.owner) INNER JOIN all_CONSTRAINTS C3 ON (c3.constraint_name = c1.r_constraint_name AND C1.OWNER = C3.OWNER) INNER JOIN all_CONS_COLUMNS C4 ON (c3.constraint_name =c4.constraint_name AND c3.table_name =c4.table_name AND c3.owner = c4.owner) WHERE C1.TABLE_NAME ='W_ORDERS_F' AND c1.owner = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND C1.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C1.STATUS = 'ENABLED' ORDER BY c1.constraint_name, c2.position ) LOOP EXECUTE immediate 'alter table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> add constraint '||c_fk_name||TO_CHAR(TableConstraint.ROW_NUMBER)||' foreign key ("'||TableConstraint.COLUMN_NAME||'") references "'||TableConstraint.FK_OWNER||'"."'||TableConstraint.FK_TABLE||'" ("'||TableConstraint.FK_COLUMN||'")'; END LOOP; END;

--SET SERVEROUTPUT ON; DECLARE c_count NUMBER := 0; BEGIN FOR TableLocalCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, sp.subpartition_position, sp.subpartition_name, sp.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) JOIN all_ind_subpartitions sp ON (ip.partition_name = sp.partition_name AND ip.index_name = sp.index_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' <$ String PartitionExchangeType; PartitionExchangeType = "PARTITION"; if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("PARTITION")) { $> AND tp.partition_name ='<$="JAN2014"$>' <$ } if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("SUBPARTITION")) { $> AND sp.subpartition_name ='<$="JAN2014"$>' <$ } $> AND ip.composite = 'YES' ORDER BY sp.subpartition_position ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); END LOOP; IF c_count = 0 THEN FOR TableLocalNonCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, ip.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' AND tp.partition_name ='<$="JAN2014"$>' AND ip.composite = 'NO' ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="JAN2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="JAN2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); END LOOP; END IF; END;

DECLARE c_fk_name varchar2(30) := ''; BEGIN c_fk_name := '<?= odiRef.getObjectShortName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?>'; IF length(c_fk_name) > 24 THEN c_fk_name := SUBSTR(c_fk_name,1,24); END IF; c_fk_name := c_fk_name||'_FK'; FOR TableConstraint IN ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUMBER, c2.column_name, C4.OWNER FK_OWNER, c4.table_name FK_TABLE, c4.column_name FK_COLUMN FROM all_CONSTRAINTS C1 INNER JOIN all_cons_columns C2 ON (c1.constraint_name=c2.constraint_name AND c1.table_name =c2.table_name AND c1.owner = c2.owner) INNER JOIN all_CONSTRAINTS C3 ON (c3.constraint_name = c1.r_constraint_name AND C1.OWNER = C3.OWNER) INNER JOIN all_CONS_COLUMNS C4 ON (c3.constraint_name =c4.constraint_name AND c3.table_name =c4.table_name AND c3.owner = c4.owner) WHERE C1.TABLE_NAME ='W_ORDERS_F' AND c1.owner = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND C1.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C1.STATUS = 'ENABLED' ORDER BY c1.constraint_name, c2.position ) LOOP EXECUTE immediate 'alter table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> add constraint '||c_fk_name||TO_CHAR(TableConstraint.ROW_NUMBER)||' foreign key ("'||TableConstraint.COLUMN_NAME||'") references "'||TableConstraint.FK_OWNER||'"."'||TableConstraint.FK_TABLE||'" ("'||TableConstraint.FK_COLUMN||'")'; END LOOP; END;

--SET SERVEROUTPUT ON; DECLARE c_count NUMBER := 0; BEGIN FOR TableLocalCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, sp.subpartition_position, sp.subpartition_name, sp.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) JOIN all_ind_subpartitions sp ON (ip.partition_name = sp.partition_name AND ip.index_name = sp.index_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' <$ String PartitionExchangeType; PartitionExchangeType = "PARTITION"; if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("PARTITION")) { $> AND tp.partition_name ='<$="JUN2014"$>' <$ } if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("SUBPARTITION")) { $> AND sp.subpartition_name ='<$="JUN2014"$>' <$ } $> AND ip.composite = 'YES' ORDER BY sp.subpartition_position ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); c_count := c_count + 1; END LOOP; IF c_count = 0 THEN FOR TableLocalNonCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, ip.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' AND tp.partition_name ='<$="JUN2014"$>' AND ip.composite = 'NO' ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="JUN2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); DECLARE c_fk_name varchar2(30) := ''; BEGIN c_fk_name := '<?= odiRef.getObjectShortName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?>'; IF length(c_fk_name) > 24 THEN c_fk_name := SUBSTR(c_fk_name,1,24); END IF; c_fk_name := c_fk_name||'_FK'; FOR TableConstraint IN ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUMBER, c2.column_name, C4.OWNER FK_OWNER, c4.table_name FK_TABLE, c4.column_name FK_COLUMN FROM all_CONSTRAINTS C1 INNER JOIN all_cons_columns C2 ON (c1.constraint_name=c2.constraint_name AND c1.table_name =c2.table_name AND c1.owner = c2.owner) INNER JOIN all_CONSTRAINTS C3 ON (c3.constraint_name = c1.r_constraint_name AND C1.OWNER = C3.OWNER) INNER JOIN all_CONS_COLUMNS C4 ON (c3.constraint_name =c4.constraint_name AND c3.table_name =c4.table_name AND c3.owner = c4.owner) WHERE C1.TABLE_NAME ='W_ORDERS_F' AND c1.owner = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND C1.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C1.STATUS = 'ENABLED' ORDER BY c1.constraint_name, c2.position ) LOOP EXECUTE immediate 'alter table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> add constraint '||c_fk_name||TO_CHAR(TableConstraint.ROW_NUMBER)||' foreign key ("'||TableConstraint.COLUMN_NAME||'") references "'||TableConstraint.FK_OWNER||'"."'||TableConstraint.FK_TABLE||'" ("'||TableConstraint.FK_COLUMN||'")'; END LOOP; END;

--SET SERVEROUTPUT ON; DECLARE c_count NUMBER := 0; BEGIN FOR TableLocalCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, sp.subpartition_position, sp.subpartition_name, sp.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) JOIN all_ind_subpartitions sp ON (ip.partition_name = sp.partition_name AND ip.index_name = sp.index_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' <$ String PartitionExchangeType; PartitionExchangeType = "PARTITION"; if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("PARTITION")) { $> AND tp.partition_name ='<$="OCT2014"$>' <$ } if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("SUBPARTITION")) { $> AND sp.subpartition_name ='<$="OCT2014"$>' <$ } $> AND ip.composite = 'YES' ORDER BY sp.subpartition_position ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); END LOOP; IF c_count = 0 THEN FOR TableLocalNonCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, ip.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' AND tp.partition_name ='<$="OCT2014"$>' AND ip.composite = 'NO' ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="OCT2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); insert /*+ APPEND */ into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> select <$="#A_TEAM.FLOW_TABLE_OPTIMIZER_HINT"$> ORDERS_JUL2014_1.ORDER_NUM, ORDERS_JUL2014_1.ORDER_DT, W_STATUS_D_JUL2014_1.ROW_WID, W_CUSTOMER_D_JUL2014.ROW_WID, W_PRODUCT_D_JUL2014_1.ROW_WID, ORDERS_JUL2014_1.QUANTITY * ORDERS_JUL2014_1.PRICE, ORDERS_JUL2014_1.CREATED_DT, ORDERS_JUL2014_1.UPDATED_DT from ((<?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ORDERS", "Staging", "D") ?> ORDERS_JUL2014_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT W_CUSTOMER_D_JUL2014_1.ROW_WID ROW_WID , W_CUSTOMER_D_JUL2014_1.CUST_ID CUST_ID , W_CUSTOMER_D_JUL2014_1.CURRENT_FLAG CURRENT_FLAG FROM <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_CUSTOMER_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_CUSTOMER_D_JUL2014_1 WHERE (W_CUSTOMER_D_JUL2014_1.CURRENT_FLAG = #A_TEAM.DefaultType2CurrentFlag ) ) W_CUSTOMER_D_JUL2014 ON ORDERS_JUL2014_1.CUST_ID = W_CUSTOMER_D_JUL2014.CUST_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_STATUS_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_STATUS_D_JUL2014_1 ON ORDERS_JUL2014_1.ORDER_STATUS = W_STATUS_D_JUL2014_1.STATUS_CD ) LEFT OUTER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_PRODUCT_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_PRODUCT_D_JUL2014_1 ON ORDERS_JUL2014_1.PROD_ID = W_PRODUCT_D_JUL2014_1.PROD_ID where (1=1) and (ORDERS_JUL2014_1.ORDER_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('JUL2014','#A_TEAM.PartitionDateFormat') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('JUL2014','#A_TEAM.PartitionDateFormat')))

DECLARE c_fk_name varchar2(30) := ''; BEGIN c_fk_name := '<?= odiRef.getObjectShortName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?>'; IF length(c_fk_name) > 24 THEN c_fk_name := SUBSTR(c_fk_name,1,24); END IF; c_fk_name := c_fk_name||'_FK'; FOR TableConstraint IN ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUMBER, c2.column_name, C4.OWNER FK_OWNER, c4.table_name FK_TABLE, c4.column_name FK_COLUMN FROM all_CONSTRAINTS C1 INNER JOIN all_cons_columns C2 ON (c1.constraint_name=c2.constraint_name AND c1.table_name =c2.table_name AND c1.owner = c2.owner) INNER JOIN all_CONSTRAINTS C3 ON (c3.constraint_name = c1.r_constraint_name AND C1.OWNER = C3.OWNER) INNER JOIN all_CONS_COLUMNS C4 ON (c3.constraint_name =c4.constraint_name AND c3.table_name =c4.table_name AND c3.owner = c4.owner) WHERE C1.TABLE_NAME ='W_ORDERS_F' AND c1.owner = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND C1.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C1.STATUS = 'ENABLED' ORDER BY c1.constraint_name, c2.position ) LOOP EXECUTE immediate 'alter table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> add constraint '||c_fk_name||TO_CHAR(TableConstraint.ROW_NUMBER)||' foreign key ("'||TableConstraint.COLUMN_NAME||'") references "'||TableConstraint.FK_OWNER||'"."'||TableConstraint.FK_TABLE||'" ("'||TableConstraint.FK_COLUMN||'")'; END LOOP; END;

--SET SERVEROUTPUT ON; DECLARE c_count NUMBER := 0; BEGIN FOR TableLocalCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, sp.subpartition_position, sp.subpartition_name, sp.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) JOIN all_ind_subpartitions sp ON (ip.partition_name = sp.partition_name AND ip.index_name = sp.index_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' <$ String PartitionExchangeType; PartitionExchangeType = "PARTITION"; if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("PARTITION")) { $> AND tp.partition_name ='<$="MAY2014"$>' <$ } if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("SUBPARTITION")) { $> AND sp.subpartition_name ='<$="MAY2014"$>' <$ } $> AND ip.composite = 'YES' ORDER BY sp.subpartition_position ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); c_count := c_count + 1; END LOOP; IF c_count = 0 THEN FOR TableLocalNonCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, ip.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' AND tp.partition_name ='<$="MAY2014"$>' AND ip.composite = 'NO' ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="MAY2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="MAY2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); END LOOP; END IF; END;

END LOOP; IF c_count = 0 THEN FOR TableLocalNonCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, ip.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' AND tp.partition_name ='<$="AUG2014"$>' AND ip.composite = 'NO' ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="AUG2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="AUG2014"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); END LOOP; END IF; END;

DECLARE c_fk_name varchar2(30) := ''; BEGIN c_fk_name := '<?= odiRef.getObjectShortName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?>'; IF length(c_fk_name) > 24 THEN c_fk_name := SUBSTR(c_fk_name,1,24); END IF; c_fk_name := c_fk_name||'_FK'; FOR TableConstraint IN ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUMBER, c2.column_name, C4.OWNER FK_OWNER, c4.table_name FK_TABLE, c4.column_name FK_COLUMN FROM all_CONSTRAINTS C1 INNER JOIN all_cons_columns C2 ON (c1.constraint_name=c2.constraint_name AND c1.table_name =c2.table_name AND c1.owner = c2.owner) INNER JOIN all_CONSTRAINTS C3 ON (c3.constraint_name = c1.r_constraint_name AND C1.OWNER = C3.OWNER) INNER JOIN all_CONS_COLUMNS C4 ON (c3.constraint_name =c4.constraint_name AND c3.table_name =c4.table_name AND c3.owner = c4.owner) WHERE C1.TABLE_NAME ='W_ORDERS_F' AND c1.owner = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND C1.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C1.STATUS = 'ENABLED' ORDER BY c1.constraint_name, c2.position ) LOOP EXECUTE immediate 'alter table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> add constraint '||c_fk_name||TO_CHAR(TableConstraint.ROW_NUMBER)||' foreign key ("'||TableConstraint.COLUMN_NAME||'") references "'||TableConstraint.FK_OWNER||'"."'||TableConstraint.FK_TABLE||'" ("'||TableConstraint.FK_COLUMN||'")'; END LOOP; END;
